name: Lifewell Tattoo
description: This tattoo comprises high-contrast geometric patterns that represent the rhythm of life. While this tattoo is on your skin, you have Resistance to Necrotic damage. When you would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, you drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Once this benefit triggers, it can't trigger again until the next dawn.

effects.name: Death Ward
effects.description: When reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead. Recharges at dawn.
